subject: Payment failed
body: Dear user, we detected irregular activity. Please verify: https://bank-secure.com/verify?session=52908
label: phishing

subject: Unusual login detected
body: Dear user, we detected irregular activity. Please verify: https://bank-secure.co/reset?session=69836
label: phishing

subject: Verify your identity
body: Dear user, your account requires immediate verification to avoid suspension. Click here: https://secure-update.net/verify?session=82416
label: phishing

subject: Invoice overdue
body: Your payment is overdue. To avoid collection action, pay immediately: https://payment-portal.net/pay?inv=12345
label: phishing

subject: Your account will be closed
body: Dear valued customer, your account will be permanently closed in 24 hours unless you verify: https://secure-update.co/verify
label: phishing

subject: IT Support: Password Reset Required
body: Your corporate password expires today. Reset immediately to avoid lockout: https://it-helpdesk.co/reset?user=employee
label: phishing

subject: You have a new voicemail
body: You have 1 new voicemail from +1-800-555-0123. Listen now: https://voicemail-portal.net/listen?id=vm123
label: phishing

subject: Document shared with you
body: John Smith shared a document with you. View document: https://docs-share.net/view?doc=confidential
label: phishing

subject: Tax refund notification
body: The IRS has calculated your refund of $2,847.00. Claim your refund: https://irs-refunds.co/claim?ssn=xxx
label: phishing

subject: Your package could not be delivered
body: Your FedEx package requires action. Reschedule delivery: https://fedex-delivery.net/reschedule?pkg=456
label: phishing
